Reference

All functions

get_caption()

The caption for the plot.

get_data_for_download()

Compiles data for downloading

get_final_numbers()

obtains final numbers from the testing data.

get_first_item()

obtains the first item for the test

get_plot()

the plot for the results page and rmarkdown documents

get_results_data_long()

Compiles final results in long format

get_text_summary()

Text summary for the top of the results page above the plot

intro_tab_div()

This is the user interface for the intro pages bfore testing

irt_function()

The IRT magic function

minimal_theme()

Theming function for the app

pagetitle()

Returns the page title for the navbar

practice_tab_div()

Shows the user interface for the practice slides.

pull_column()

Pulls a pasted column from the final data for exporting data from the app during testing.

results_tab_div()

Shows the user interface for the results page.

results_tab_div2()

Shows the user interface for the resutls page when using the rescore function

run_app()

Run the Shiny Application

score_uploaded_data()

Scores data that has been uploaded.

slides_tab_div()

User interface for the assessment tab
